DOC.brief_summary: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor ( MIF ) pleiotropic cytokine promote inflammatory response.In animal study , find MIF release ischaemic heart , promote glucose uptake protect heart ischaemia-reperfusion injury.The MIF concentration , influenced age myocardial ischemia , different impact myocardial functional recovery ischemia.Therefore , purpose experiment study clinical significance MIF patient coronary heart disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Diagnosis Meaning MIF Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.detailed_description: MIF pleiotropic cytokine promote inflammatory response . MIF express several cell type , include monocytes/macrophages , vascular smooth muscle cardiomyocytes , release stimulation pre-formed storage pool . A foreign study report MIF demonstrate offer protection I/R-injury activate adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase ( AMPK ) inhibit c-Jun Nterminal kinase ( JNK ) -induced apoptosis cardiomyocytes . In addition , animal experiment show MIF reduce age heart compare young heart . Coronary heart disease chronic ischemic disease , MIF may play protective factor whole procedure . We observe individual take coronary angiography hospitalization . Individuals assign coronary-artery-disease group , include acute coronary syndrome stable ischemic heart disease , non-coronary-artery-disease group , accord coronary angiography . All participant extract 3ml blood sample 5 minute coronary angiography . Coronary-artery-disease group take another two blood sample , 5 minute open balloon 5 minute stent implant , respectively .
